descriptions.description: Avahi is a fully LGPL framework for Multicast DNS Service Discovery. It allows programs to publish and discover services and hosts running on a local network with no specific configuration. For example you can plug into a network and instantly find printers to print to, files to look at and people to talk to.

set.commands: PACKAGE_NAME=avahi PACKAGE_VERSION=0.6.31 oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.gz #oegimport libiconv-1.14 #oegimport gettext-0.18.3 configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
